gruvboxMaterial.darkContrast.markdownDescription: Background contrast for the dark variant. [Preview](https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material#introduction)

gruvboxMaterial.lightContrast.markdownDescription: Background contrast for the light variant. [Preview](https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material#introduction)

gruvboxMaterial.darkWorkbench.markdownDescription: Workbench style for the dark variant. [Preview](vscode:extension/sainnhe.gruvbox-material)

gruvboxMaterial.lightWorkbench.markdownDescription: Workbench style for the light variant. [Preview](vscode:extension/sainnhe.gruvbox-material)

gruvboxMaterial.darkCursor.description: The cursor color in the dark variant.

gruvboxMaterial.lightCursor.description: The cursor color in the light variant.

gruvboxMaterial.darkSelection.description: The background color of selected text in the dark variant.

gruvboxMaterial.lightSelection.description: The background color of selected text in the light variant.

gruvboxMaterial.darkPalette.markdownDescription: The color palette used in the dark variant. [Preview](https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material#introduction)
markdownEnumDescriptions: Carefully designed to have a soft contrast.
Color palette obtained by calculating the mean of the other two.
The color palette used in the original gruvbox.

gruvboxMaterial.lightPalette.markdownDescription: The color palette used in the light variant. [Preview](https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material#introduction)
markdownEnumDescriptions: Carefully designed to have a soft contrast.
Color palette obtained by calculating the mean of the other two.
The color palette used in the original gruvbox.

gruvboxMaterial.colorfulSyntax.description: Enabling this option will cause more tokens to be colored. By default, only the minimum but necessary tokens will be colored.

hooks.pre-commit: echo 'Regenerating /themes/*.json ...' && tsc -p src && node out/hook/generateTheme.js && git add themes && echo 'Formatting...' && lint-staged
